entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
